description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) decodes the configuration data and modules.(Citation: Fidelis TrickBot Oct 2016)(Citation: Cyberreason Anchor December 2019)(Citation: Joe Sec Trickbot)

external_references.description: Reaves, J. (2016, October 15). TrickBot: We Missed you, Dyre. Retrieved August 2, 2018.
Dahan, A. et al. (2019, December 11). DROPPING ANCHOR: FROM A TRICKBOT INFECTION TO THE DISCOVERY OF THE ANCHOR MALWARE. Retrieved September 10, 2020.
Joe Security. (2020, July 13). TrickBot's new API-Hammering explained. Retrieved September 30, 2021.
